snippet: A late catch by Odell Beckham Jr., ruled a touchdown on the field, became an incomplete pass on review, and Tom Brady then drove New England into range for a winning field goal.
abstract: New England Patriots defeat New York Giants, 27-26.
lead_paragraph: A late catch by Odell Beckham Jr., ruled a touchdown on the field, became an incomplete pass on review, and Tom Brady then drove New England into range for a winning field goal.

headline.print_headline: A Strip. A Drop. Then an Upset Slips Away.
headline.main: A Strip. A Drop. Then a Giants Win Over the Patriots Slips Away.
